name: Binance
description: Binance is one of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges globally, offering spot, futures, staking, and a wide range of digital assets.

name: Bybit
description: Bybit is a popular crypto derivatives exchange with spot trading, leverage, copy trading, and regular trading competitions.

name: Bitget
description: Bitget is a futures and spot trading exchange known for copy trading features and promotional campaigns.

name: Crypto.com
description: Crypto.com is an exchange with its own app, Visa card, and wide asset support, focusing on usability and crypto payments.

name: Coinmotion
description: Coinmotion is a Finnish crypto exchange providing euro deposits, bank transfers, and simple investing tools.

name: Northcrypto
description: Northcrypto is a Finnish exchange that supports euro payments and is known for its local compliance and user-friendliness.

name: Phantom
description: Phantom is a non-custodial wallet for Solana, allowing users to store, swap, and stake SOL and SPL tokens.

name: MetaMask
description: MetaMask is the most used Ethereum wallet browser extension, supporting DeFi and Web3 apps.

name: Solflare
description: Solflare is a secure wallet built for the Solana ecosystem, available as a browser extension and mobile app.

name: Rabby Wallet
description: Rabby is a browser-based wallet for Ethereum and EVM chains, focusing on security and usability in DeFi.

name: Jupiter Wallet
description: Jupiter Wallet integrates with the Jupiter DEX aggregator on Solana and supports native token interactions.

name: Ledger Nano X
description: Ledger Nano X is a hardware wallet with Bluetooth support, mobile compatibility, and high-end secure chip.

name: Trezor Model T
description: Trezor Model T is a hardware wallet featuring a touchscreen and open-source firmware for advanced security.

name: Wormhole
description: Wormhole is a cross-chain messaging protocol that facilitates asset transfers between major blockchains.

name: Portal Bridge
description: Portal Bridge is built on Wormhole to allow cross-chain asset transfers across multiple blockchains.

name: Mayan Bridge
description: Mayan is a Solana-focused bridge allowing token swaps and cross-chain transfers with low fees.

name: Jumper
description: Jumper is a bridge aggregator that routes your transfers through the best available cross-chain options.

name: LayerZero
description: LayerZero is an omnichain protocol that provides cross-chain messaging and interoperability.

name: deBridge
description: deBridge is a decentralized cross-chain protocol designed for secure interoperability across blockchains.
